message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $120. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $110?
I understand you're looking to keep your budget under $120, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. This is the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly settle at $115?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $115 and $127.50, which is $121.50. This is my final offer.
